text: Mayor Lori Lightfoot shared plans for more training and oversight of police in Chicago Public Schools. Some students are not satisfied. Here’s a closer look at the reforms. https://t.co/7PZ2dO5sxm

text:
“Not everything has to be about Black trauma or a big statement.”

These two Chicago artists aren’t letting the current social climate dictate their work. https://t.co/iifA45SbbA
